title: Create New Transfer Tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a Club **(admin-sd-all/containjust357)**
AND has a player with a Minor League status=Active
AND has an Addendum C
custom_steps:
WHEN user opens player
AND clicks Create New on Player's History
AND selects Transaction > Minor > Assignment > Transfer of Minor League Player
custom_expected: THEN blank Transfer tx form opens in Edit mode

title: Submit Transfer Tx to BOC
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has completed [C147047]
custom_steps:
WHEN user fills in required fields (Transfer To and Assignment Date fields)
AND clicks Submit to BOC
custom_expected:
THEN Transfer tx is submitted successfully 
AND should see a Blue Successful Submit message
AND player's PENDING roster status is set to Pending Club's team 
AND Club should receive notification

title: Approve Transfer Tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC user (admin-boc-all/beginathens975)
AND has completed [C147048]
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC user opens Submitted Tx
AND clicks Approve
custom_expected:
THEN Transfer tx is approved
AND player's ACTUAL roster status is set to Active
AND Club should receive notification

title: Reverse Transfer Tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN BOC user completes [C147049]
custom_steps:
WHEN user opens approved transfer tx
AND clicks Reverse
custom_expected:
THEN player's transfer tx is reversed
AND player's ACTUAL roster status is set back to what it was before transfer
AND Tx shows as "Voided" on Player's History 
AND Club should receive notification

title: Create New Optional Assignment
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a Club **(admin-sd-all/containjust357)**
AND has a Major league player with Status=Active
AND has an Addendum C
custom_steps:
WHEN user opens player
AND clicks Create new from Player History
AND selects Transaction > Major > Assignment > Optional Assignment
custom_expected: THEN blank Optional Assignment tx will open in Edit mode

title: Submit Optional Assignment to BOC
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has completed [C147054]
custom_steps:
WHEN user fills in required fields (Assignment Date and Assign To fields)
AND clicks Submit to BOC
AND ignores and continues through warning message
custom_expected:
THEN Optional Assignment is submitted successfully 
AND should see a Blue Successful Submit message
AND player's PENDING roster status is set to Optioned/Active 
AND Club should receive notification

title: Approve Optional Assignment
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user logs in as the BOC (admin-boc-all/beginathens975)
AND has completed [C147055]
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC opens submitted Optional Assignment
AND clicks Approve
custom_expected:
THEN Optional Assignment is approved
AND player's ACTUAL roster status is set to Optioned/Active and Club is set to value in Assigned to field
AND Club should receive notification

title: Reject Optional Assignment
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user logs in as the BOC (admin-boc-all/beginathens975)
AND has completed C147055
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC opens submitted Optional Assignment
AND clicks Reject
custom_expected:
THEN Optional Assignment is rejected
AND players Pending Roster status returns to Null
AND Club should receive notification

title: Create New Recall Tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a Club **(admin-sd-all/containjust357)**
AND has a Major League player with a Roster Status=Optioned/Active
custom_steps:
WHEN user opens player
AND clicks Create New from Player History 
AND selects Transaction > Major > Assignment > Recall
custom_expected: THEN blank Recall tx opens in Edit mode

title: Submit Recall Tx to BOC
custom_preconds: GIVEN user completes [C147062]
custom_steps:
WHEN user fills in required fields (Assignment Date field, there will be a "player to replace" field for some players)
AND clicks Submit
custom_expected:
THEN Recall Tx is submitted successfully 
AND should see a Blue Successful Submit message
AND player's PENDING roster status is set to Active
AND Club should receive notification

title: Approve Recall Tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user logs in as the BOC (admin-boc-all/beginathens975)
AND has completed [C147063]
custom_steps:
WHEN user opens Submitted Recall tx
AND user clicks Approve
custom_expected:
THEN Recall Tx is approved
AND player's ACTUAL roster status is set to Active and Club is set to their previous Club
AND Club should receive notification

title: Submit "Not to Report" Recall Tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has completed [C147062]
custom_steps:
WHEN user fills in required fields on Recall tx
AND clicks the "Not To Report" checkbox
AND clicks Submit
custom_expected:
THEN Recall Tx is submitted successfully 
AND should see a Blue Successful Submit message
AND player's PENDING roster status is set to Not to Report
AND Club should receive notification

title: Create New Major/Minor Outright
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as the BOC (admin-boc-all/beginathens975)
AND has a Major league player with Status=Active
AND has an Addendum C (player- Luis Perdomo, San Diego Padres, Player ID #364963)
custom_steps:
WHEN user opens player
AND clicks Create new from Player History
AND selects Transaction > Major > Assignment > Major/Minor Outright
AND Ignores & Continues any warning
custom_expected: THEN blank Major/Minor Outright tx will open in Edit mode

title: Submit Major/Minor Outright
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has completed [C189039]
custom_steps:
WHEN user fills in required fields (Assign To: El Paso Chihuahuas-AAA and Check the "Player given contemplated outright form" checkbox if present, will not be present for all players)
AND clicks Submit
custom_expected:
THEN Major/Minor Outright is submitted successfully 
AND should see a Blue Successful Submit message

title: Approve Major/Minor Outright
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user logs in as the BOC (admin-boc-all/beginathens975)
AND has completed [C189040]
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC opens submitted Major/Minor Outright 
AND clicks Approve
custom_expected:
THEN Major/Minor Outright is approved
AND Club is set to the selected Assign To field on tx
AND Club should receive notification

title: Reject Major/Minor Outright
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user logs in as the BOC (admin-boc-all/beginathens975)
AND has completed C189040
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC opens submitted Major/Minor Outright 
AND clicks Reject
custom_expected:
THEN Major/Minor Outright is rejected
AND Club stays set to their current Club
AND Club should receive notification

title: Create New Selection to ML Roster
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a Club (admin-sd-all/containjust357)
AND has a Minor league player with Status=Active
custom_steps:
WHEN user opens player
AND clicks Create new from Player History
AND selects Transaction > Major > Assignment > Selection to ML Roster
AND Ignores & Continues any warning
custom_expected: THEN blank Selection to ML Roster tx will open in Edit mode

title: Submit Selection to ML Roster
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has completed [C189310]
custom_steps:
WHEN user fills in required fields (Assignment Date)
AND clicks Submit to BOC
custom_expected:
THEN Selection to ML Roster is submitted successfully 
AND should see a Blue Successful Submit message

title: Approve Selection to ML Roster
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user logs in as the BOC (admin-boc-all/beginathens975)
AND has completed [C189311]
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC opens submitted Selection to ML Roster
AND clicks Approve
custom_expected:
THEN Selection to ML Roster is approved
AND Club is set to the Major League Club that the player belongs to 
AND Club should receive notification

title: Reverse Selection to ML Roster
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user logs in as the BOC (admin-boc-all/beginathens975)
AND has completed [C189312]
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC opens Approved Selection to ML Roster
AND clicks Reverse
custom_expected:
THEN Selection to ML Roster is reversed 
AND Club is set back to the Minor League Club that the player previously belonged to 
AND Club should receive notification

title: Create New Elect Free Agency
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a Club (admin-sd-all/containjust357)
AND has a Major league player with Status=Active
custom_steps:
WHEN user opens player
AND clicks Create new from Player History
AND selects Transaction > Major > Free Agency > Elect Free Agency
custom_expected: THEN blank Elect Free Agency tx will open in Edit mode

title: Submit Elect Free Agency to BOC
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has completed [C189848]
custom_steps:
WHEN user fills in required fields (Elect Under Article and Election Date)
AND clicks Submit to BOC
custom_expected:
THEN Elect Free Agency is submitted successfully 
AND should see a Blue Successful Submit message
AND players PENDING roster status shows "Free Agent" in green

title: Approve Elect Free Agency
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user logs in as the BOC (admin-boc-all/beginathens975)
AND has completed [C189849]
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC opens submitted Elect Free Agecny tx
AND clicks Approve
custom_expected:
THEN Elect Free Agency tx is approved
AND players ACTUAL roster status becomes "Free Agent"
AND Club should receive notification

title: Reject Elect Free Agency
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user logs in as the BOC (admin-boc-all/beginathens975)
AND has completed [C189849]
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC opens submitted Elect Free Agecny tx
AND clicks Reject
custom_expected:
THEN Elect Free Agency tx is rejected
AND players ACTUAL roster status stays "Active"
AND green PENDING roster status of "Free Agent" is removed
AND Club should receive notification

title: Create New Sign to Major League Roster
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as the BOC (admin-boc-all/beginathens975)
AND Advanced Search (magnifying glass at top of page) for player, making filter be "ML Roster Status" "Is" "Free Agent"
AND select a player with Status=Free Agent
custom_steps:
WHEN user opens player
AND clicks on Create new from Player History
AND selects Transaction > Major > Free Agency > Sign to Major League Roster
custom_expected: THEN a blank Sign to Major League Roster will open in Edit mode

title: Approve Sign to Major League Roster
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as the BOC (admin-boc-all/beginathens975)
AND has completed [C196347]
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC fills in Required fields (Sign To [select: San Diego Padres or MIN Twins], Sign Date, and Report Date)
AND clicks Approve
custom_expected:
THEN Sign to Major League Roster tx is approved
AND transaction status is updated to "Approved"
AND a blue succesful notification is displayed
AND the player's current Minor League Roster status is set to null
AND the player's Major League Roster status is set to "Active"
AND will update the players History: Code =MJSEL Description = Selection to ML Roster, From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields to be in black font

title: Reverse Sign to Major League Roster
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user logs in as the BOC (admin-boc-all/beginathens975)
AND user completes [C196349]
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC opens approved Sign to Major League Roster tx
AND clicks Reverse
custom_expected:
THEN the Sign to Major League Roster tx will be Reversed
AND the transaction status will update to Reversed
AND set the player's Status=Free Agent

title: Create New Sign to Major League Roster as Club
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as the CLUB (admin-sd-all/containjust357)
AND has a player with Status=Free Agent
custom_steps:
WHEN user opens player
AND clicks on Create new from Player History
AND selects Transaction > Major > Free Agency > Sign to Major League Roster
custom_expected:
THEN Sign to Major League Roster will be greyed out with (BOC) next to the tx name
AND the user will not be able to select it

title: Create New Declare Minor League Free Agent
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as the BOC (admin-boc-all/beginathens975)
AND has a Minor League player with Status=Active
custom_steps:
WHEN user opens player
AND clicks on Create new from Player History
AND selects Transaction > Major > Free Agency >  Declare Minor League Free Agent
custom_expected: THEN a blank Declare Minor League Free Agent will open in Edit mode

title: Approve Declare Minor League Free Agent
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as the BOC (admin-boc-all/beginathens975)
AND has completed [C196505]
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC opens a Declare Minor League Free Agent in transaction state "Preliminary" 
AND clicks Approve
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction state is updated to "Approved"
AND the form is reloaded to view mode
AND a successful approved blue notification is displayed
AND a blue notification expiring the player’s contract
AND set the player’s major league roster status to “Free Agent”
AND set the player’s minor league roster status to “Free Agent”

title: Reverse Declare Minor League Free Agent
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user logs in as the BOC (admin-boc-all/beginathens975)
AND user completes [C196506]
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC opens approved Declare Minor League Free Agent tx
AND clicks Reverse
custom_expected:
THEN Declare Minor League Free Agent tx will be Reversed
AND the transaction status is updated to "Reversed"
AND a successful reverse notification is displayed
AND un-expire the players Minor Contract notification is displayed
AND set back to prior pending and current Club and Org
AND set back to prior pending and current Major and Minor League roster status

title: Create New  Declare Free Agent as Club
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as the CLUB (admin-sd-all/containjust357)
AND has a Minor League player with Status=Active
custom_steps:
WHEN user opens player
AND clicks on Create new from Player History
AND selects Transaction > Major > Free Agency > Declare Minor League Free Agent
custom_expected:
THEN Declare Minor League Free Agent will be greyed out with (BOC) next to the tx name
AND the user will not be able to select it

title: Create New Release of a Minor League Player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as the BOC (admin-boc-all/beginathens975)
AND has a Minor League player with Status=Active
custom_steps:
WHEN user opens player
AND clicks on Create new from Player History
AND selects Transaction > Minor > Assignment >  Release of a Minor League Player
custom_expected: THEN a blank Release of a Minor League Player tx will open in Edit mode

title: Submit Release of a Minor League Player
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has completed [C196509]
custom_steps:
WHEN user fills in required fields (Release Date / Released to Foreign League)
AND clicks Submit to BOC
custom_expected:
THEN Release of a Minor League Player is submitted successfully 
AND should see a Blue Successful Submit message
AND the transaction status should update to "Submitted to BOC"
AND players PENDING roster status shows "Released" in green

title: Approve Release of a Minor League Player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user logs in as the BOC (admin-boc-all/beginathens975)
AND has completed [C196510]
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC opens submitted  Release of a Minor League Player tx
AND clicks Approve
custom_expected:
THEN Release of a Minor League Player is approved
AND players ACTUAL roster status becomes "Released"
AND Club should receive notification

title: Reject Release of a Minor League Player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user logs in as the BOC (admin-boc-all/beginathens975)
AND has completed [C196510]
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC opens submitted Release of a Minor League Player tx
AND clicks Reject
custom_expected:
THEN Release of a Minor League Player tx is Rejected
AND transaction status is updated to "Rejected"
AND successful reject notification is displayed
AND reverse player's Pending org and club
AND reverse player's pending Major and Minor League Roster statuses.
